ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(7) > section:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > h1:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4:nth-child(1)

html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(5) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(4) > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(6) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
